name: liri-node-app
description: LIRI is like iPhone's SIRI.  However, while SIRI is a Speech Interpretation and Recognition Interface, LIRI is a _language_Interpretation and Recognition Interface.  LIRI will be a command line node app that takes in parameters and gives you back data.  LIRI will search Spotify for songs, Bands in Town for concerts, and OMDB for movies.
